text: Dark Blue World () is a 2001 Czech British German Danish Italian French American war drama movie directed by Jan Svěrák and starring Ondřej Vetchý, Kryštof Hádek, Tara FitzGerald, Oldřich Kaiser, Charles Dance. == Other websites == * * * * Category:2000s war movies Category:2001 drama movies Category:Czech drama movies Category:British war movies Category:British drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:Danish drama movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:American war movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Jan Svěrák
title: Dark Blue World
